author: namapane
body:
Complete the copy ctor and assignment op of DTRecoConditions (cf https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/9e6c46eddeed3fb6abd7d305cf8e9d093302a85a#commitcomment-11050618).
Complete tools for writing/dumping this payload. 
Clean-up (remove) unused/dummy/duplicate DT payload tools.
title: Dt conditions cleanup
